name: Wire Network
overview:
Reinventing the wheel: A Micro-Blogging and Social Media Network. The social media network idea that is being developed will add simplicity to existing social media websites.

Simplicity is a major drive to attract users (ie: Twitter and tumblr). Wire Network will provide a social media platform where users can share content, effortlessly. The content will then be organized so you see what you want to see at that point in time. Follow your favorites and see what you want to see. It is a new take on old technology, Let’s reinvent the wheel.
